listitem.para: typedef enum glm_euler_seq glm_euler_seq

enum glm_euler_seq { GLM_EULER_XYZ = 0 << 0 | 1 << 2 | 2 << 4, GLM_EULER_XZY = 0 << 0 | 2 << 2 | 1 << 4, GLM_EULER_YZX = 1 << 0 | 2 << 2 | 0 << 4, GLM_EULER_YXZ = 1 << 0 | 0 << 2 | 2 << 4,
GLM_EULER_ZXY = 2 << 0 | 0 << 2 | 1 << 4, GLM_EULER_ZYX = 2 << 0 | 1 << 2 | 0 << 4 }
CGLM_INLINE glm_euler_seq glm_euler_order (int ord[3])
CGLM_INLINE void glm_euler_angles (mat4 m, vec3 dest)
extract euler angles (in radians) using xyz order

build rotation matrix from euler angles
